name: A light between realms
description: The hardest maze game around. Guide the light through a dark and dangerous maze. Try to collect all of the shards of light in the maze to brighten your path. I am offering a prize to the first player to beat the game on Legend Status. To claim the $20 dollar gift card first donate at least 1 USD to the itch.io project, take a picture of your donation conformation than send it along with a recording of your full run to Besthwt@gmail.com. The recording must have your full run and win screen along with you time to qualify for the prize.  Good luck.
